abstract: The digital hunt for an iPhone lost in a New York City bar a year ago that last week connected two strangers, one an editor at BuzzFeed, Matt Stopera, and the other a Chinese man now known to millions online as “Brother Orange,” is heading toward a personal encounter.

headline.main: ‘Brother Orange’ and Owner of Stolen iPhone Plan to Meet in China
